events.message: I received the phone yesterday and noticed the screen has several scratches and the device seems to have some other minor damages.
The issue has been classified as a Product Defect based on the customer's description of scratches and damages.
Support agent Stephanie has been assigned to handle the reported defective product case.
Hello, this is Stephanie from support. I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your phone. Let's get this sorted out for you quickly.
Could you please send us photos of the scratches and damages? This will help us verify the defect and process your claim accordingly.
I have attached several photos showing the scratched screen and the dent on the back of the phone as requested.
Thank you for the photos. We will send you a replacement device at no extra cost and arrange a pickup for the damaged phone.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and the replacement offer.
The replacement device has been shipped and the pickup for the defective phone is scheduled for tomorrow morning.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement phone and that everything is working fine now.
Yes, I received the new phone yesterday and it’s in perfect condition. Thanks again for your help!
Your case has been successfully closed. Please let us know if you need any further assistance in the future.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey to gather your feedback on the support you received.
